price: (ភស្ដុតាងនោះ)គឺអ្នកនាំសារម្នាក់(មូហាំម៉ាត់)មកពី អល់ឡោះ ដែលគេនឹងសូត្រគម្ពីរដ៏ស្អាតស្អំ(គម្ពីរគួរអាន)
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
